Instantly Score Your Page’s SEO

Drop in a URL and get a real-time SEO snapshot—see what’s working and what needs fixing in seconds

  • Get a quick SEO score for your page, no deep audit required.
  • Instantly spot major issues affecting your rankings.
  • Focus on immediate improvements that make an impact.

Fix SEO Issues Before  They Cost You Rankings

No need to dig through endless reports – this tool flags only the SEO problems that matter.

  • Identify high-impact issues like missing meta tags, slow speed, and broken links.
  • Get straightforward fixes for instant improvements.
  • Avoid common SEO mistakes that hold your page back.

See Your Site’s Top Keywords & Backlinks

Find out how your page is ranking right now and what’s influencing its performance.

  • Get top keywords your page ranks for (and where to improve).
  • See high-value backlinks pointing to your page.
  • Compare against competitor pages to find gaps

Benchmark Against the Competition

How does your page compare? Get insight into your top competitors and learn how to beat them.

  • Focus on small tweaks that help you move up.
  • Identify ranking gaps and steal their winning strategies.
  • See how you stack up.
